Author: bumpugly
Text: I know it sounds difficult but consider explicitly telling your family members to NOT give their opinions or comments on your ED.   Saying something like, “I need you to help me and this is the way I need you to help: by being aware but never commenting unless I ask for your input.”  Often times people are more willing to follow YOUR instructions than you think. This makes them feel valued by you, as well, so it can be a win-win.   Good luck with your struggles. It is brave of you to come this far.
